title: Ancient Prison Graffiti in Sicily Exposes Inmates’ Games and Deepest Fears
description: Inside a tiny, four-square-meter cell carved into the walls of an old Sicilian hilltop fortress that was decimated by an earthquake back in 1693, researchers have uncovered centuries-old prison wall art. It was created by people with a lot of time on their hands and a sharp object to carve with.
